markdownRemark.html: Not to be confused with the Marbella Golf near the hospital. This golf club is up in the hills, and is really worth the visit. It's a must have a buggy course, and the landscape doesn't disappoint. Great views. It is really fun to play. This golf course has sweeping fairways, elevated tees & greens, awesome views and is in excellent condition.

frontmatter.title: Marbella Club Golf Resort
frontmatter.description: Marbella Club Golf Resort - Not to be confused with the Marbella Golf near the hospital. This golf club is up in the hills, and is really worth the visit. It's a must have a buggy course, and the landscape doesn't disappoint. Great views. It is really fun to play. This golf course has sweeping fairways, elevated tees & greens, awesome views and is in excellent condition.
frontmatter.address: Km 3.7, Carreterra de Benahavis, 29679, Benahavis, Marbella, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 100.00 euros,  Highest green fee weekends 100.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
